name: The Great Gun Heist
description:
The Great Gun Heist: A game by Timothy Yabuki using Unity's FPS Micro Game Kit

In this fast pace first person shooter level, brave the hostile enemy star ship of the Ventus Cruiser in order to steal the experimental weapon. Explore the ship and use a variety of weapons and tactics to defeat its automonous security systems and make your way to the ship's secret storage.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Sprint: Left Shift
  • Switch Weapons: 1-4 or scroll wheel
  • Shoot: Left click
  • Aim down sights: Right click
